COMMITTEE ON FINANCE
March 22, 1967
The Reverend Colman J. Barry, O.S.B.
President
Saint John's University
Collegeville, Minnesota
Dear Father Colman:
I appreciate receiving your letter concerning
the proposed Public Television Act of 1967.
The Senate Committee on Commerce has scheduled
hearings on this bill, S. 1160, on April 11-14 and
on April 25-28. I am pleased to have your comments
in support of the bill and assure you that I will
do all I can to see that it is favorably considered
in the Senate.
With best wishes.
Sincerely yours
Eugene J. McCarthy
